kalshi_title: Will Bitcoin be above $$100,000 by Dec 31, 2025 at 11:59pm ET? Above $100,000
reason: Both contracts ask if Bitcoin price will be above $100,000 at the exact same date and time (Dec 31, 2025, 11:59pm ET).

kalshi_title: How high will Bitcoin get this year? $200,000 or above
reason: Both contracts ask if Bitcoin will reach or exceed $200,000 in the year 2025.

kalshi_title: Will Bitcoin be above $250000 by Jan 1, 2027 at 12:00AM ET? Above $250000
reason: Both contracts ask if Bitcoin will be above $250,000 by the end of 2025 (Kalshi contract's Jan 1, 2027 12:00AM ET is equivalent to end of 2025).

poly_title: Will Bitcoin dip to $50,000 by December 31, 2025?
kalshi_title: How low will Bitcoin get this year? Below $50,000
reason: Both contracts ask if Bitcoin will dip below $50,000 at any time during 2025.
